name: Dreaming in the mountains
description:
A dream and a question

Content
This is a short game that will take you about 30 minutes
The game tells the story of a climber who enters a dream
The player, as an abstract subject in the dream, experiences various dream slices
Tap, maze, puzzle, walking simulation...
hope you get something out of this

Features
  • Each dream slice has a different gameplay
  • Each dream slice has a different Art Style
  • Each dream slice is very short and has a unique expression
  • If you immerse yourself in playing this game, you will experience a fleeting eerie feeling
